name: Monimedia
description:
We are an award winning, digital brand experience agency, providing management consultancy and digital services for brands and retailers in Asia since 2006. We partner with our clients to deliver outstanding customer experience across multi-channel both online and offline that drive traffic, increase sales and strengthen customer loyalty. We are committed in delivering the best in-class omnichannel and ecommerce suite of services using industry best practices.
We design experience that connect people to brands.Â
